description: '''Koothu''', or '''Therukoothu''', is an ancient [[Dance forms of Tamil Nadu|Tamil art form]], where artists enacted scenes from epics and folklore with dance and music. It is a form of storytelling art that originated in the early [[Tamilakam]], and served as an entertainment and a medium to educate the people about religion and history. Various forms exist such as [[Terukuttu]] and [[Kattaikkuttu]].
